channel.title: How do i add ::home to varrock?!
channel.description:
Hey i want too change the spawn point too varrock and i want the command ::home too be in varrock big bank too :S
Please help me wich file shall i edit im using a 562!

Think this is it use your command.java

item.title: How do i add ::home to varrock?!
item.dc:creator: @Love_me_plox Love me plox
item.description:
@Love_me_plox wrote:

[code]First find your client.java.

Then use Ctrl+F and search for:

if(command.startsWith

Then add this under the last command you find.

if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights > 0) {toX = CORDS FOR VARROCK HERE;toY = CORDS FOR VARROCK HERE;}

Where it says CORDS HERE find the cordinates for the area you want the new home to be and put them there.

Hope i could help you out if you still need help let me know.

Read full topic
